readable.title: 3583321426_f373c52161
readable.content: An elderly middle-eastern woman is about to smoke a pack of cigarettes . A middle Eastern woman wearing green is sitting on a stone step holding a box of cigarettes . A woman in an orange scarf pulls a pack of cigarettes from a carton . A woman wearing a long green dress and scarves on her head holding a pack of cigarettes and a carton of Winston cigarettes by a stone structure . Woman with red headscarf and green dress holding cigarette carton and sitting on concrete steps .
